text:
Hi.  Note, I am new to Julia.  I want to obtain values from an HTML document.  I can do so with the following code but it is designed to open a window and output the data to it.  Instead, I would like to simply obtain values from the HTML doc.  What do you recommend?  Thanks in advance!!!



using Blink
myHTML = """<div id="stuff" style="color:green;">17</div>"""
window = Window()
body!(window, myHTML, async=false);
outjs=js(window, Blink.JSString("""document.getElementById("stuff").innerHTML"""),callback=true)
println("output of the JavaScript: ",  outjs)

17
""" window = Window() body!(window, myHTML, async=false); outjs=js(window, Blink.JSString("""document.getElementById("stuff").innerHTML"""),callback=true) println("output of the JavaScript: ",  outjs)

Hi.   I will try it.  In the meantime, I stumbled onto EzXML.jl.
